subScenes.name: 问候与提交
subScenes.description: 在退税柜台礼貌问候并提交退税单

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, I'd like to claim my tax refund.

responses.text: Sure, I can help with that. May I see your passport and receipts?
responses.text_cn: 当然，我可以帮您，请出示护照和收据？

responses.text: Yeah, just hand over your stuff.
Tax refund? Here's my form.

qaPairs.usageNote: 初次接触用正式语，避免太随意。

qaPairs.speakerText: Do you have your shopping receipts and tax-free form?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您有购物收据和免税单吗？

responses.text: Yes, here they are — all signed and stamped.
Uh, I think I lost one... can I still get it?
responses.text_cn: 呃，我好像丢了一张，还能办吗？

responses.text: Got 'em! All here.

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认单据齐全是关键，别慌。

subScenes.name: 核对商品
subScenes.description: 工作人员核对所购商品与单据

qaPairs.speakerText: Can you show me the perfume you bought?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 能给我看看您买的香水吗？

responses.text: Of course, here it is — still sealed.
I opened it... is that a problem?
Uh, it's in my suitcase.

qaPairs.usageNote: 未拆封更易通过，提前准备好。

qaPairs.speakerText: Is this the only item you're claiming?

responses.text: No, I've got three more in this bag.
Yeah, just this one.
Wait, I forgot my watch!

qaPairs.usageNote: 别漏报商品，提前清点好。

subScenes.name: 选择退款方式
subScenes.description: 选择现金、刷卡或银行转账退款

qaPairs.speakerText: We can refund you in cash, credit, or bank transfer — which do you prefer?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们可退现金、刷卡或银行转账，您选哪个？

responses.text: I'll take it in cash, please — I need it for the taxi.
Bank transfer’s fine, no rush.
Credit? How long?

qaPairs.usageNote: 现金最快，转账需留意到账时间。

qaPairs.speakerText: Bank transfer might take 5–10 business days.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 银行转账大概要5到10个工作日。

responses.text: Okay, I'll go with cash then.
Really? That long? Ugh...
No problem, I'll do bank transfer.

qaPairs.usageNote: 听到时间后要立刻做决定。

subScenes.name: 确认到账与道别
subScenes.description: 确认退款信息并礼貌道别

qaPairs.speakerText: Your refund is processed. You'll get a receipt.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您的退税已处理，这是收据。

responses.text: Thanks so much! Have a great day!
responses.text_cn: 太感谢了！祝你今天愉快！

responses.text: Cool, thanks.
Wait — is this the full amount?

qaPairs.usageNote: 收据保留好，有争议可查。

qaPairs.speakerText: If you have any issues, call this number.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如有问题，请拨打这个电话。

responses.text: Got it, I'll save it right away.
Okay, thanks.
Can I text you instead?

qaPairs.usageNote: 别只说谢谢，确认联系方式。
